participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and somewhat introspective, yet struggling with anger management.
participant_1.background: I'm a bit out of touch with my family because of my job, but I'm trying to get better at it. I am colour blind. I am still trying to lose weight. My favorite animal is the panda.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, with a focus on personal growth.
participant_2.background: I ride my bicycle to work. I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing. I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions. I hate skiing. My favorite band is Worn.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing alright. I'm just a bit out of touch with my family because of my job, but I'm trying to get better at it.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you can make more time for them soon.
Thanks, me too. Do you have any family nearby?
Yeah, I live with my parents and my brother.
That's nice. I wish I lived closer to my family.
It's definitely nice to have them close by.
Yeah, I'm trying to get better at keeping in touch with them even though I'm not close by.
That's good. I'm sure they appreciate it.
Thanks. What do you do for work?
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to fix my own bike.
It's not too hard. I could teach you sometime if you want.
